title: how to upgrade 1.5.0 to 1.5.1

process:
  Apply all migrations
error:
psycopg2.errors.CannotCoerce: cannot cast type integer to uuid
LINE 1: ...E "api_example" ALTER COLUMN "id" TYPE uuid USING "id"::uuid
                                                                 ^
